Title: Shun Li and the Poet
Writer: Andrea Segre (story), Andrea Segre (screenplay), Marco Pettenello (screenplay)
Actors: Tao Zhao, Rade Serbedzija, Marco Paolini, Roberto Citran
Plot: A study of the friendship between a Chinese woman and a fisherman who came to Italy from Yugoslavia many years ago, who live in a small city-island in the Veneto lagoon.
